00041 TableMutatorScatterBuffer::TableMutatorScatterBuffer(Comm *comm,
00042     const TableIdentifier *table_identifier, SchemaPtr &schema_ptr,
00043     RangeLocatorPtr &range_locator_ptr, uint32_t timeout_ms)
00044   : m_comm(comm), m_schema_ptr(schema_ptr),
00045     m_range_locator_ptr(range_locator_ptr), m_range_server(comm, timeout_ms),
00046     m_table_identifier(*table_identifier), m_full(false), m_resends(0),
00047     m_timeout_ms(timeout_ms) {
00048 
00049   m_range_locator_ptr->get_location_cache(m_cache_ptr);
00050 }

00057 void
00058 TableMutatorScatterBuffer::set(const Key &key, const void *value,
00059                                uint32_t value_len, Timer &timer) {
00060   RangeLocationInfo range_info;
00061   TableMutatorSendBufferMap::const_iterator iter;
00062 
00063   if (!m_cache_ptr->lookup(m_table_identifier.id, key.row, &range_info)) {
00064     timer.start();
00065     m_range_locator_ptr->find_loop(&m_table_identifier, key.row, &range_info,
00066                                    timer, false);
00067   }
00068 
00069   iter = m_buffer_map.find(range_info.location);
00070 
00071   if (iter == m_buffer_map.end()) {
00072     m_buffer_map[range_info.location] = new TableMutatorSendBuffer(
00073         &m_table_identifier, &m_completion_counter, m_range_locator_ptr.get());
00074     iter = m_buffer_map.find(range_info.location);
00075 
00076     if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(range_info.location.c_str(),
00077         (*iter).second->addr))
00078       HT_THROW(Error::INVALID_METADATA, range_info.location);
00079   }
00080 
00081   (*iter).second->key_offsets.push_back((*iter).second->accum.fill());
00082   create_key_and_append((*iter).second->accum, key.flag, key.row,
00083       key.column_family_code, key.column_qualifier, key.timestamp);
00084   append_as_byte_string((*iter).second->accum, value, value_len);
00085 
00086   if ((*iter).second->accum.fill() > MAX_SEND_BUFFER_SIZE)
00087     m_full = true;
00088 }

00094 void TableMutatorScatterBuffer::set_delete(const Key &key, Timer &timer) {
00095   RangeLocationInfo range_info;
00096   TableMutatorSendBufferMap::const_iterator iter;
00097 
00098   if (!m_cache_ptr->lookup(m_table_identifier.id, key.row, &range_info)) {
00099     timer.start();
00100     m_range_locator_ptr->find_loop(&m_table_identifier, key.row, &range_info,
00101                                    timer, false);
00102   }
00103 
00104   iter = m_buffer_map.find(range_info.location);
00105 
00106   if (iter == m_buffer_map.end()) {
00107     m_buffer_map[range_info.location] = new TableMutatorSendBuffer(
00108         &m_table_identifier, &m_completion_counter, m_range_locator_ptr.get());
00109     iter = m_buffer_map.find(range_info.location);
00110 
00111     if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(range_info.location.c_str(),
00112         (*iter).second->addr))
00113       HT_THROW(Error::INVALID_METADATA, range_info.location);
00114   }
00115 
00116   (*iter).second->key_offsets.push_back((*iter).second->accum.fill());
00117   uint8_t key_flag;
00118   if (key.column_family_code == 0)
00119     key_flag = FLAG_DELETE_ROW;
00120   else if (key.column_qualifier)
00121     key_flag = FLAG_DELETE_CELL;
00122   else
00123     key_flag = FLAG_DELETE_COLUMN_FAMILY;
00124 
00125   create_key_and_append((*iter).second->accum, key_flag, key.row,
00126       key.column_family_code, key.column_qualifier, key.timestamp);
00127   append_as_byte_string((*iter).second->accum, 0, 0);
00128 
00129   if ((*iter).second->accum.fill() > MAX_SEND_BUFFER_SIZE)
00130     m_full = true;
00131 }

00134 
00138 void
00139 TableMutatorScatterBuffer::set(SerializedKey key, ByteString value,
00140                                Timer &timer) {
00141   RangeLocationInfo range_info;
00142   TableMutatorSendBufferMap::const_iterator iter;
00143   const uint8_t *ptr = key.ptr;
00144   size_t len = Serialization::decode_vi32(&ptr);
00145 
00146   if (!m_cache_ptr->lookup(m_table_identifier.id, (const char *)ptr+1,
00147                            &range_info)) {
00148     timer.start();
00149     m_range_locator_ptr->find_loop(&m_table_identifier, (const char *)ptr+1,
00150                                    &range_info, timer, false);
00151   }
00152 
00153   iter = m_buffer_map.find(range_info.location);
00154 
00155   if (iter == m_buffer_map.end()) {
00156     m_buffer_map[range_info.location] = new TableMutatorSendBuffer(
00157         &m_table_identifier, &m_completion_counter, m_range_locator_ptr.get());
00158     iter = m_buffer_map.find(range_info.location);
00159 
00160     if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(range_info.location.c_str(),
00161         (*iter).second->addr))
00162       HT_THROW(Error::INVALID_METADATA, range_info.location);
00163   }
00164 
00165   (*iter).second->key_offsets.push_back((*iter).second->accum.fill());
00166   (*iter).second->accum.add(key.ptr, (ptr-key.ptr)+len);
00167   (*iter).second->accum.add(value.ptr, value.length());
00168 
00169   if ((*iter).second->accum.fill() > MAX_SEND_BUFFER_SIZE)
00170     m_full = true;
00171 }

00174 namespace {
00175 
00176   struct SendRec {
00177     SerializedKey key;
00178     uint64_t offset;
00179   };
00180 
00181   inline bool operator<(const SendRec sr1, const SendRec sr2) {
00182     const char *row1 = sr1.key.row();
00183     const char *row2 = sr2.key.row();
00184     int rval = strcmp(row1, row2);
00185     if (rval == 0)
00186       return sr1.offset < sr2.offset;
00187     return rval < 0;
00188   }
00189 }

00195 void TableMutatorScatterBuffer::send() {
00196   TableMutatorSendBufferPtr send_buffer_ptr;
00197   std::vector<SendRec> send_vec;
00198   uint8_t *ptr;
00199   SerializedKey key;
00200   SendRec send_rec;
00201   size_t len;
00202 
00203   m_completion_counter.set(m_buffer_map.size());
00204 
00205   for (TableMutatorSendBufferMap::const_iterator iter = m_buffer_map.begin();
00206        iter != m_buffer_map.end(); ++iter) {
00207     send_buffer_ptr = (*iter).second;
00208 
00209     if ((len = send_buffer_ptr->accum.fill()) == 0) {
00210       m_completion_counter.decrement();
00211       continue;
00212     }
00213 
00214     send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates.set(new uint8_t [len], len);
00215 
00216     if (send_buffer_ptr->resend()) {
00217       memcpy(send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates.base,
00218              send_buffer_ptr->accum.base, len);
00219       send_buffer_ptr->send_count = send_buffer_ptr->retry_count;
00220     }
00221     else {
00222       send_vec.clear();
00223       send_vec.reserve(send_buffer_ptr->key_offsets.size());
00224       for (size_t i=0; i<send_buffer_ptr->key_offsets.size(); i++) {
00225         send_rec.key.ptr = send_buffer_ptr->accum.base
00226                            + send_buffer_ptr->key_offsets[i];
00227         send_rec.offset = send_buffer_ptr->key_offsets[i];
00228         send_vec.push_back(send_rec);
00229       }
00230       sort(send_vec.begin(), send_vec.end());
00231 
00232       ptr = send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates.base;
00233 
00234       for (size_t i=0; i<send_vec.size(); i++) {
00235         key = send_vec[i].key;
00236         key.next();  // skip key
00237         key.next();  // skip value
00238         memcpy(ptr, send_vec[i].key.ptr, key.ptr - send_vec[i].key.ptr);
00239         ptr += key.ptr - send_vec[i].key.ptr;
00240       }
00241       HT_ASSERT((size_t)(ptr-send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates.base)==len);
00242       send_buffer_ptr->dispatch_handler_ptr =
00243           new TableMutatorDispatchHandler(send_buffer_ptr.get());
00244 
00245       send_buffer_ptr->send_count = send_buffer_ptr->key_offsets.size();
00246     }
00247 
00248     send_buffer_ptr->accum.free();
00249     send_buffer_ptr->key_offsets.clear();
00250 
00254     try {
00255       send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates.own = false;
00256       m_range_server.update(send_buffer_ptr->addr, m_table_identifier,
00257           send_buffer_ptr->send_count, send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates,
00258           send_buffer_ptr->dispatch_handler_ptr.get());
00259     }
00260     catch (Exception &e) {
00261       if (e.code() == Error::COMM_NOT_CONNECTED) {
00262         send_buffer_ptr->add_retries(send_buffer_ptr->send_count, 0,
00263                                      send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates.size);
00264         m_completion_counter.decrement();
00265       }
00266     }
00267     send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates.own = true;
00268   }
00269 }

00272 
00276 bool TableMutatorScatterBuffer::completed() {
00277   return m_completion_counter.is_complete();
00278 }

00281 
00285 bool TableMutatorScatterBuffer::wait_for_completion(Timer &timer) {
00286   if (!m_completion_counter.wait_for_completion(timer)) {
00287     if (m_completion_counter.has_errors()) {
00288       TableMutatorSendBufferPtr send_buffer_ptr;
00289       std::vector<FailedRegion> failed_regions;
00290 
00291       for (TableMutatorSendBufferMap::const_iterator it = m_buffer_map.begin();
00292            it != m_buffer_map.end(); ++it)
00293         (*it).second->get_failed_regions(failed_regions);
00294 
00295       if (!failed_regions.empty()) {
00296         Cell cell;
00297         Key key;
00298         ByteString bs;
00299         const uint8_t *endptr;
00300         Schema::ColumnFamily *cf;
00301         for (size_t i=0; i<failed_regions.size(); i++) {
00302           bs.ptr = failed_regions[i].base;
00303           endptr = bs.ptr + failed_regions[i].len;
00304           while (bs.ptr < endptr) {
00305             key.load((SerializedKey)bs);
00306             cell.row_key = key.row;
00307             cf = m_schema_ptr->get_column_family(key.column_family_code);
00308             HT_ASSERT(cf);
00309             cell.column_family = m_constant_strings.get(cf->name.c_str());
00310             cell.column_qualifier = key.column_qualifier;
00311             cell.timestamp = key.timestamp;
00312             bs.next();
00313             cell.value_len = bs.decode_length(&cell.value);
00314             bs.next();
00315             m_failed_mutations.push_back(std::make_pair(cell,
00316                                          failed_regions[i].error));
00317           }
00318         }
00319       }
00320 
00321       // this prevents this mutation failure logic from being executed twice
00322       // if this method gets called again
00323       m_completion_counter.clear_errors();
00324 
00325       if (m_failed_mutations.size() > 0)
00326         HT_THROW(failed_regions[0].error, "");
00327 
00328     }
00329     return false;
00330   }
00331   return true;
00332 }

00335 TableMutatorScatterBuffer *
00336 TableMutatorScatterBuffer::create_redo_buffer(Timer &timer) {
00337   TableMutatorSendBufferPtr send_buffer_ptr;
00338   SerializedKey key;
00339   ByteString value, bs;
00340   TableMutatorScatterBuffer *redo_buffer = 0;
00341 
00342   try {
00343     redo_buffer = new TableMutatorScatterBuffer(m_comm, &m_table_identifier,
00344         m_schema_ptr, m_range_locator_ptr, m_timeout_ms);
00345 
00346     for (TableMutatorSendBufferMap::const_iterator iter = m_buffer_map.begin();
00347          iter != m_buffer_map.end(); ++iter) {
00348       send_buffer_ptr = (*iter).second;
00349 
00350       if (send_buffer_ptr->accum.fill()) {
00351         const uint8_t *endptr;
00352 
00353         bs.ptr = send_buffer_ptr->accum.base;
00354         endptr = bs.ptr + send_buffer_ptr->accum.fill();
00355 
00356         // now add all of the old keys to the redo buffer
00357         while (bs.ptr < endptr) {
00358           key.ptr = bs.next();
00359           value.ptr = bs.next();
00360           redo_buffer->set(key, value, timer);
00361           m_resends++;
00362         }
00363       }
00364 
00365     }
00366   }
00367   catch (Exception &e) {
00368     delete redo_buffer;
00369     throw;
00370   }
00371 
00372   return redo_buffer;
00373 }

00375 
00376 void TableMutatorScatterBuffer::reset() {
00377   for (TableMutatorSendBufferMap::const_iterator iter = m_buffer_map.begin();
00378        iter != m_buffer_map.end(); ++iter)
00379     (*iter).second->reset();
00380 }
